meanings.definition: A type of edible mushroom with a blue or lilac cap.
meanings.sent1: I found some delicious blewits in the forest.
meanings.sent2: The chef used blewits to make a tasty mushroom soup.
meanings.sent3: The blewits added a unique flavor to the pasta dish.
meanings.sent4: The blewits stood out like colorful jewels in the grass.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the blewits filled the kitchen with a delightful scent.

meanings.definition: Past tense of the verb 'blow', meaning to expel air forcefully.
meanings.sent1: He blewits out the candles on his birthday cake.
meanings.sent2: The wind blewits the leaves off the trees in autumn.
meanings.sent3: She blewits a big bubble with her gum and it popped loudly.
meanings.sent4: The whistle blewits loudly, signaling the end of the game.
meanings.sent5: The train blewits its whistle as it departed from the station.

meanings.definition: A slang term for something that is impressive or amazing.
meanings.sent1: The new video game is absolute blewits!
meanings.sent2: Her performance on stage was pure blewits.
meanings.sent3: Wow, that trick you did was total blewits!
meanings.sent4: The fireworks display was a real blewits of colors and lights.
meanings.sent5: The concert was a blewits of talent and energy.
